name: Unfilled Sandbag with Dual Compartment for Yoga 2 Pack Not Include Fillers
short_description: 【Innovative Dual-Bag Design】Our Yoga Sandbag features a secure dual-bag structure, with the outer bag crafted from durable 600D waterproof Oxford fabric that is both wear-resistant and skin-friendly. The inner bag is also waterproof. This thoughtful design effectively repels dust and moisture, making it ideal for high-intensity workouts.

【Customizable Weight Capacity】The inner bag is designed to hold approximately 10 lbs of sand, allowing you to easily adjust the filling to suit your personal strength training needs. This feature makes it simple to control the weight, providing flexibility for various exercises, whether you’re a beginner or an experienced practitioner.

【Unique Double-Layer Velcro Leak Prevention】Designed to prevent any sand leakage, our inner bag incorporates a unique top-opening feature with a double-layer Velcro closure. This innovative design ensures that your sand stays securely contained, providing peace of mind even during the most vigorous workouts.

【Enhanced Zipper Dock Protection】We’ve added a thoughtful "zipper dock" at the zipper closure point to prevent any misalignment and protect your hands from sharp edges. This extra feature guarantees smooth operation and enhances overall safety during use.

【Wide Range of Applications】Our versatile Yoga Sandbag is ideal for a variety of fitness activities, including yoga, Pilates, strength training, and rehabilitation exercises. Its adjustable weight and durable design make it suitable for users of all fitness levels, from beginners to seasoned professionals, allowing for a more effective and personalized training experience.
product_description: Enhance your fitness routine with our Premium Fillable Yoga Sandbag, expertly designed with a dual compartment structure for optimal functionality. The durable 600D waterproof Oxford outer fabric and waterproof inner bag promise resilience against wear and easy maintenance. Featuring a user-friendly zipper opening and a secure double-layer Velcro closure, this sandbag guarantees no sand leakage during your workouts. Whether you’re practicing yoga, Pilates, or engaging in strength training, you can easily adjust the weight to suit your personal fitness goals. Experience the perfect blend of convenience and quality with our versatile yoga sandbag, an essential tool for any fitness enthusiast.

name: REP Fitness Sandbags - Heavy Duty Workout Sandbags for Training, Cross-Training Workouts, Fitness, Exercise and Military Conditioning - Multiple Sizes and Colors
short_description: What’s Included: 1 Medium Tan Sandbag. Medium sandbags (25-75 lbs) include 1 medium tan sandbag shell, 1 small, and 1 large filler bag. Sand is NOT included. Each bag comes with a 1-year warranty covering normal wear and tear. If you aren’t happy we'll do our best to make it right!

Double-Reinforced Sandbags: Train as hard as you want with 7 rivet-reinforced handles and durable cross-stitched 1000D Cordura shell. The soft handles make for a more comfortable grip while triple-stitched seams, heavy duty YKK zippers, and industrial hook-and-eye closure filler bags keep your sand where it’s supposed to be. IMPORTANT: Ideal working weight range for sandbags is 70-80% of the max capacity. DO NOT fill filler bags beyond 3/4 full. Doing so will increase the chance of bursting.

Multi-Function Training: Sandbags are a versatile training tool for beginners and advanced athletes. The dynamic shape and shifting weight require you to engage multiple muscle groups. Build grip strength with drags and carries, increase your power with cleans, snatches, drags, and throws, or mix up your strength training with deadlifts, squats, presses, and lunges.

Space Saving & Adjustable: Soft, compact, and fully adjustable - sandbags are perfect for training at home or on the go. Quickly adjust your weight based on your workout with the included filler bags, or stock up on extra for more training options.

Designed in Denver : REP Fitness designs and manufactures high-quality strength and conditioning equipment for home and commercial gyms. We carry a full line of strength and conditioning equipment including benches, barbells, dumbbells, racks, cardio equipment and more!
product_description: Rep Sandbags Rep sandbags are designed to be ultra-durable and easy to use for any sandbag workouts. Choose the size that suits your needs. Sand is NOT included. Specs 1000D Cordura for maximum durability Large YKK zipper 6 handles Handles are all soft to avoid any chance of uncomfortable contact points on your shoulders Cross-stitched and triple/quadruple stitched with heavy-duty thread Filler bags are double velcro design for leak resistance Stitched-in logo and weight capacity Available in 4 different sizes (S, M, L, XL) and 7 different colors (army green, black, blue, camo, pink, red, tan) Weight Options Small (5-25 lb) includes: 1 small filler bag Medium (25-75 lb) includes: 1 large filler bag and 1 small filler bag Large (50-125 lb) includes: 3 large filler bags XL (125-200 lb) includes: 4 large filler bags NOTE: DO NOT fill filler bags beyond 3/4 full. Doing so will increase the chance of bursting. 1 year warranty covering normal wear and tear. Sandbags are not designed to be slammed, dragged, or pouring sand directly into shell (not using filler bags).
